Their responsibilities can vary depending on the organization and project, but here are some common tasks and responsibilities associated with UI/UX designers:            User Research      Conduct user research to understand the target audience's needs, preferences, and behaviors.      Create user personas and user journey maps to guide design decisions.          Information Architecture      Organize and structure information to create a logical and intuitive user experience.      Design site maps and navigation systems.          Wire framing and Prototyping      Create wireframes and low-fidelity prototypes to outline the layout and functionality of the interface.      Iterate on designs based on feedback and testing.          Visual Design      Develop a visually appealing and consistent design language, including color schemes, typography, and imagery.      Create user personas and user journey maps to guide design decisions.          Interaction Design:      Define how users will interact with the product, including buttons, forms, and interactive elements.      Ensure that interactions are intuitive and user-friendly.          Usability Testing      Conduct usability testing to gather feedback from users and identify areas for improvement.      Make design adjustments based on usability findings. Communicate design decisions effectively.          Accessibility      Ensure that the design is accessible to all users, including those with disabilities, by following accessibility guidelines (e.g., WCAG).          Responsive Design      Design interfaces that work seamlessly across various devices and screen sizes (responsive design).          User Documentation      Create user documentation or style guides to maintain design consistency.          Stay Updated      Keep up with industry trends, emerging technologies, and design best practices to continually improve your skills and designs.          Problem-Solving      Solve design challenges and make data-driven design decisions to enhance the user experience.          Continuous Improvement      Seek feedback from users, colleagues, and stakeholders to refine and improve designs over time.          Testing and QA      Collaborate with developers during the implementation phase to ensure that the final product matches the design and functions as intended.          Adaptability      Be flexible and adaptable to changing project requirements and evolving user needs.

column2: Job Description for Senior Flutter Developer About Aezo Tech Pvt Ltd Aezo Tech Pvt Ltd is an innovative AI-enabled platform that aims to transform how businesses operate. Located in the dynamic ecosystem of T-Hub in Hyderabad, Telangana, Aezo is dedicated to enhancing member engagement and operational efficiency by providing up-to-date information on industry movements, global business developments, and government initiatives. Website & App:  aezo.asia Role Overview We are looking for an experienced and innovative Senior Flutter Developer to join our vibrant team. This role involves designing and developing high-quality, scalable mobile applications that cater to the needs of our clients. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in mobile development with a particular focus on Flutter, be adept at working both independently and as part of a team, and possess a passion for continuous learning and excellence. Key Responsibilities Design and build advanced applications for the Android and iOS platforms using Flutter. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications. Maintain code integrity and organization. Utilize native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms. Maintain and enhance existing mobile applications. Lead the development process for mobile applications, including testing, installation, and support. Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews. Qualifications Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. At least 5 years of experience in Flutter mobile app development Proven experience in mobile frameworks and mobile development languages such as Dart, Kotlin, or Swift is a plus. Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect applications to back-end services. Experience with performance and memory tuning tools. Strong  understanding of design principles for iOS and Android. Excellent problem-solving skills, with high attention to detail. Strong  communication skills and ability to work in a team environment. Job Location T-Hub, Knowledge City, Serilingampally, Hyderabad, Telangana 500081 Company Website & App: aezo.asia with Work From Office / Hybrid Why Join Us? Joining Aezo Tech Pvt Ltd means becoming part of a forward-thinking team dedicated to making a significant impact in the business sector. You will work on innovative projects, enhance your skills, and contribute to the growth and success of our platform. How to Apply Please send your resume to sulmeetkaur@aezo.asia and admin@aezo.asia. We are excited to explore how you can contribute to our team at Aezo Tech Pvt Ltd.

column2: GLOBAL ALUMINIUM PVT LTD is looking for Key Accounts Manager to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     A Key Accounts Manager is responsible for managing and nurturing relationships with key clients or customers of a company     Their primary focus is on building long-term partnerships, maximizing customer satisfaction, and driving business growth within the key accounts     Here are some key responsibilities and tasks associated with the role of a Key Accounts Manager:Relationship Management: Developing strong relationships with key clients by understanding their business needs, goals, and challenges     This involves regular communication, conducting meetings, and building rapport with key stakeholders     Account Development: Identifying opportunities for account growth and expansion within the key accounts     This may involve cross-selling or upselling additional products or services, identifying new business opportunities, and developing strategies to increase revenue and market share     Customer Retention: Ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction and retention within the key accounts     This includes proactively addressing customer concerns, resolving issues, and acting as the primary point of contact for any service-related inquiries or escalations     Strategic Planning: Collaborating with internal teams, such as sales, marketing, and product development, to develop strategic account plans     These plans outline the objectives, strategies, and action steps required to meet customer needs and achieve business goals     Performance Monitoring: Tracking and analyzing key performance metrics and indicators for the key accounts     This includes monitoring revenue growth, customer satisfaction scores, market trends, and competitive activities to identify areas for improvement and develop proactive strategies

column2: Job description We are looking for a React Native developer interested in building performant mobile apps on both the iOS and Android platforms. You will be responsible for architecting and building these applications, as well as coordinating with the teams responsible for other layers of the product infrastructure. Building a product is a highly collaborative effort, and as such, a strong team player with a commitment to perfection is required.   Responsibilities: Architect, design, and develop: High-quality, robust, and scalable mobile applications using React Native and related technologies. Pixel-perfect UIs that align seamlessly with design specifications. User-friendly and intuitive interactions that provide an exceptional user experience. Maintainable and reusable code adhering to best practices and patterns. Implementation: Native modules when necessary for performance-critical features or deep platform integration. State management solutions like Redux or MobX for complex applications. Offline functionality and efficient data synchronization. Secure authentication and authorization mechanisms. Proactively contribute to code reviews and provide constructive feedback. Actively participate in discussions and share knowledge within the team. Continuous Learning: Maintain a passion for learning and stay current with evolving React Native, JavaScript, and mobile development trends. Qualifications: 5+ years of professional experience developing mobile applications with React Native. Strong understanding of JavaScript (ES6+), including asynchronous programming concepts. Proficiency in Redux or similar state management libraries. Experience with common React Native components, libraries, and tools. Understanding of Android and iOS development concepts. Experience with API integration and RESTful services. Solid knowledge of testing frameworks and practices. Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills. Strong work ethic, self-motivation, and ability to work independently and as part of a team.

column2: Job Title: PHP Developer Experience: 3 -4 years Location: Panchkula Job Description We are looking for a PHP Developer responsible for managing back-end services and the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, definition and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. Therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well. Responsibilities  Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers  Build efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules  Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges  Integration of data storage solutions  Develop, test, and deploy high-quality web applications using PHP frameworks (CodeIgniter and Laravel).  Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.  Ensure the security, performance, and scalability of the applications.  Keep up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to suggest improvements. Skills And Qualifications  Proven work experience as a PHP Developer (3-4 years).  Proficient in PHP development with a focus on CodeIgniter or Laravel frameworks.  Extensive experience working with databases; strong knowledge of SQL and database design.  Solid understanding of front-end technologies, such as HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, to collaborate effectively with the front-end team.  Ability to design and implement robust, scalable, and efficient web applications.  In-depth knowledge of web application architecture and best practices.  Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.  Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot complex issues.  Familiarity with RESTful API development and integration.  Strong portfolio showcasing web applications developed using CodeIgniter or Laravel.  Experience with database management and optimization.  Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment. Benefits:  Career Growth  Competitive salary based on experience.  Great perks + performance bonuses altogether  Health and vision insurance.  Opportunities for professional development and training.  Flexible work hours.  Great team to work and chill with SCO-11 MDC Sector 5 P

column2: Job Summary: We are seeking a highly skilled Mobile App Software Developer with expertise in the .NET framework, specifically targeting mobile application development using .NET MAUI. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in C# and previous experience with Xamarin, which has been succeeded by MAUI. This role involves developing high-quality mobile applications and contributing to web development projects managed by EB Administration and Consulting Technology, ensuring cross-functional versatility. Duties / Responsibilities: Design, develop and support iOS and Android mobile apps, leveraging .NET MAUI and related technologies. Monitor mobile app performance and troubleshoot issues. Demonstrate expertise in C# using .NET MAUI / Xamarin Forms platforms for mobile app development. Manage and optimize deployment pipelines for mobile applications targeting the Apple App Store and Google Play Store, ensuring compliance with platform guidelines, managing versioning and configuration. Coordinate with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot deployment issues and implement best practices for continuous integration and continuous delivery to enhance deployment efficiency and reliability. Engage as needed in web development projects, demonstrating proficiency in ASP.NET MVC / Blazor, JavaScript, and SQL. Adapt to new technologies, particularly in mobile and responsive web development. Actively participate in Agile / Scrum team ceremonies and processes. Mentor peers and support code reviews to maintain high standards in coding and design practices. Document development processes and maintain high-quality code documentation. Support the team in strategic initiatives, interfacing with various operational and business units. Provide software development support in whatever capacity deemed necessary for the successful completion of EBAC Tech strategic initiatives, including but not limited to interfacing with support, quality assurance, operational staff, product managers and business customers.  Required Skills & Attributes: Expertise with iOS and Android multi-platform mobile development frameworks, ideally .NET MAUI, or a willingness to rapidly adapt from Xamarin native or Xamarin Forms. Experience in .NET Framework, C#, SQL Server, and usage of RESTful APIs. Strong commitment to secure, scalable, and reliable coding practices. Excellent teamwork, collaboration, and mentoring abilities. Superior analytical, logical, and problem-solving skills. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. High integrity and discretion to ensure the confidentiality of sensitive client data. Required Qualifications: Bachelors degree in computer science or a related field, or equivalent work experience. 5+ years of mobile app software development experience. Preferred Skills and Qualifications: Experience with JavaScript and ASP.NET Core Blazor, MVC, and / or Web Forms design patterns. Experience working in a multi-national Agile Software Development Life Cycle on Scrum teams leveraging Microsoft Azure DevOps for work item management. Ability to thrive within a dynamic team environment.

column2: Acropink Creative Agency is looking for Business Development Associate to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey. A Business Development Associate is a professional who supports the growth and expansion of a company by identifying new business opportunities, nurturing relationships with potential clients, and collaborating with other departments to achieve business goals. Some key responsibilities include:     Conduct market research to identify new business opportunities and potential customers     Reach out to potential clients through cold-calling, emailing, and networking     Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and new clients     Prepare and present proposals and sales pitches to potential clients     Collaborate with other departments such as marketing, product development, and customer service to ensure client satisfaction and business growth     Monitor industry trends and market changes to make recommendations to the management team     Prepare reports on business development activities and results     Attend industry events and conferences to build relationships and gather market intelligence.     Strong communication and interpersonal skills, the ability to work independently and as part of a team, and experience with sales or business development
